name: New Balance model UXC72 Black
description: The New Balance model UXC72 sneakers embody the trend of retro-futurism, thanks to a design inspired by the speculative technological optimism of concept cars of the 1970s. Characteristic sole patterns and angular elements are used to give the familiar smoothness of the sneaker an aggressiveness. The XC-72 shape with a unique split sole unit creates a new discovery for New Balance design.Suede overlays, which are located in the area of ​​the toe and heel, provide additional protection and guarantee long-term use. Mesh inserts in the upper construction ensure air circulation inside the sneaker. The peculiar design of sneakers will make you stand out from the crowd.

name: New Balance model 327 Black
description: New Balance model 327 sneakers have a textile upper that ensures air circulation inside the shoes. Additional overlays on the top protect the leg from damage, and make the shoe more durable. The lacing system provides a better fit and support for the foot, and the elastic tongue of the shoe fits comfortably on the rise of the foot and makes the pressure of the lacing almost imperceptible without loss of fixation. The extended midsole consists of a thick layer of soft EVA, which guarantees a high level of comfort. The durable sole in combination with spikes provides excellent traction.The sole goes to the front and back, which not only complements the design of the model, making it original, but also provides wear resistance and increases the service life. Sneakers are ideal for creating bright everyday looks and will provide comfort in every step you take.

name: New Balance model 574 Classic Black
description: The history of the legendary New Balance 574 sneakers begins in the late 80s. They gained instant popularity when runner Dick Beardsley finished the 1982 Boston Marathon. And on his feet were the same NB574. Athletes highly appreciated the wear resistance and cushioning characteristics of the model. The purpose has changed since then, but they still remain a key silhouette in the classic New Balance line. New Balance model 574 Classic sneakers have a combined upper that guarantees wear resistance. Relief protector for better grip with natural surfaces, when driving on rough terrain. The sole made of foamed EVA is light and flexible, has good shock-absorbing properties. Sneakers are designed for daily use.

name: New Balance model MR530 White&Black
description: Sneakers New Balance model MR530 provide daily comfort. In the 90s, the first 530 model was released, which was created for running. It gained popularity so quickly that it created a unique sports aesthetic and is now associated with very comfortable and stylish sneakers. The mesh upper is complemented by dense materials for additional foot support and better wear resistance. The improved lacing system provides a better fit, fixation and support of the foot. The original design of the model attracts attention. The wear-resistant sole provides excellent grip and will extend the service life of the shoes. The model is designed to provide comfort in every step you take.

name: New Balance model ARISН
description: Sneakers New Balance model ARISHI are designed for running on a hard surface and for training of various complexity. The knitted upper provides a feeling of naturalness and allows the foot to breathe. The shoe's elastic tongue fits snugly against the rise of the foot and makes lacing pressure almost imperceptible without loss of fixation. Seamless edging inside the shoe prevents chafing during training. Regardless of which part of your foot you land on the surface, Fresh Foam technology provides maximum cushioning, and the rubber sole provides lightness, durability and good grip. The clearly expressed logo of the brand interestingly complements the design. Versatile shoes for those who value lightness and love an active lifestyle.

name: New Balance model Propel
description: New Balance model Propel sneakers are designed for running. Regardless of the distance, the sneakers provide high energy return and excellent support. Woven textile upper with a minimal number of seams for a feeling of naturalness and lightness. The lacing system provides a good fit and support for the foot. The shoe's elastic tongue fits snugly against the rise of the foot and makes lacing pressure almost imperceptible without loss of fixation. The sole made of foam material creates a feeling of elasticity. Additional weight reduction of the shoe by positioning the wear-resistant sole only in areas vulnerable to wear. Extremely comfortable model of sneakers, guarantees maximum comfort and lightness in every step.

name: New Balance ACHIEVER Т1 Black
description: The New Balance ACHIEVER T1 is a cutting-edge athletic shoe that combines style, comfort, and performance. Designed for individuals who strive for success in their daily pursuits, these sneakers are packed with features that enhance both form and function.Starting with the design, the ACHIEVER T1 showcases a sleek and modern aesthetic. The upper is constructed with a combination of breathable mesh and durable synthetic materials, providing a comfortable and secure fit. The shoe's low-profile silhouette gives it a streamlined look, while the bold New Balance branding adds a touch of sporty sophistication.When it comes to comfort, the ACHIEVER T1 does not disappoint. It features a cushioned midsole that absorbs impact and provides excellent support throughout the day. Whether you're hitting the gym, going for a run, or simply running errands, these sneakers will keep your feet comfortable and energized. The padded collar and tongue further enhance the overall comfort, reducing friction and preventing irritation.In terms of performance, the ACHIEVER T1 incorporates several technologies to optimize your athletic performance. The outsole is engineered with durable rubber, ensuring excellent traction on various surfaces and enhancing stability during quick movements. The shoe also employs a responsive cushioning system that offers a springy and energetic feel, giving you an extra boost during workouts or runs.

name: New Balance model 515 Blue
description: The New Balance model 515 sneakers are made of a combination of suede and synthetic materials, as well as mesh, which improves comfort and ventilation. The combination of natural and synthetic materials in the construction of the upper ensures the strength and wear resistance of the shoe. The classic lacing system ensures a good fixation and support of the foot, and the elastic tongue of the shoe makes the lacing pressure almost imperceptible. The midsole made of EVA foam provides comfort and good vibration absorption during daily use, while the durable rubber sole, which has a classic tread, adds good grip to the shoe. The clearly expressed logo of the brand interestingly complements the design.

name: Nike Blazer Mid '77 Jumbo
description: The Nike Blazer Mid '77 Jumbo is a bold and distinctive sneaker that combines vintage-inspired design elements with contemporary style. These sneakers are part of Nike's iconic Blazer collection, known for their basketball heritage and timeless appeal.The upper of the Nike Blazer Mid '77 Jumbo is crafted from premium leather, providing a luxurious look and feel. The shoe features an oversized Swoosh logo on the sides, making a striking statement and adding a touch of modernity to the classic silhouette. The Jumbo design gives the Swoosh an exaggerated size, enhancing its visual impact.With a mid-top profile, the Blazer Mid '77 Jumbo offers ankle support and a comfortable fit. The padded collar and tongue provide cushioning and support, ensuring all-day comfort. The lace-up closure allows for a secure and adjustable fit, while the Nike branding on the tongue and heel adds to the overall aesthetic.Underneath, the Nike Blazer Mid '77 Jumbo is equipped with a durable rubber outsole that provides excellent traction and grip on various surfaces. The shoe also features a reinforced toe cap for added durability, making it suitable for both casual wear and light athletic activities.

name: Nike Blazer Mid '77 Vintage White&Black
description: The Nike Blazer Mid '77 Vintage sneakers blend retro aesthetics with modern comfort, making them a stylish choice for both fashion enthusiasts and sneakerheads. These mid-top shoes are a tribute to the original Nike Blazer, which debuted on the basketball courts in the 1970s and later became a popular streetwear icon.The upper of the Nike Blazer Mid '77 Vintage is constructed with a combination of premium leather and synthetic materials, offering durability and a sleek appearance. The vintage-inspired design features a clean and minimalistic look, with the iconic Nike Swoosh logo adorning the sides in a contrasting color for a distinctive touch.For enhanced comfort and support, these sneakers feature a padded collar and tongue, providing a cushioned feel around the ankle. The traditional lacing system allows for a secure and customizable fit, ensuring that the shoes stay snug on your feet during any activity.Beneath the feet, the Nike Blazer Mid '77 Vintage boasts a durable rubber outsole with a herringbone pattern. This pattern not only delivers excellent traction on various surfaces but also adds a touch of nostalgia, reminiscent of classic basketball shoes. The midsole features a foam cushioning, which provides lightweight and responsive support for all-day comfort.

name: Nike Blazer Low '77 Jumbo
description: NIKE BLAZER LOW '77 JUMBO - original men's sneakers. A stylish combination of white color with beige inserts and bright black logos will allow you to create unusual everyday looks. The upper is made of durable genuine leather, and the flat, flexible rubber sole is comfortable for everyday use. Inside - textile decoration and a soft insole. Stitched leather overlays and soft suede on the toes add durability and traditional style. The rubber outsole has a embossed herringbone pattern for excellent traction. A large Swoosh logo and extended laces accentuate the sneaker's iconic look and add a bold look to any outfit.

name: Nike Air Force 1 '07
description: The Nike Air Force 1 '07 sneakers are a timeless and iconic footwear model that showcases a perfect blend of style, comfort, and versatility. With its sleek and classic design, these sneakers have become a staple in sneaker culture and are highly sought after by fashion enthusiasts and sneakerheads alike.The upper of the Nike Air Force 1 '07 is constructed using premium quality leather, providing durability and a luxurious feel. The low-top silhouette offers a sleek and streamlined look, making it suitable for various occasions and outfit choices. The clean lines and minimalist design elements contribute to its overall aesthetic appeal.Equipped with a lace-up closure system, these sneakers allow for a secure and customizable fit, ensuring optimal comfort for prolonged wear. The padded collar and cushioned insole offer excellent support and cushioning, making them perfect for all-day use.The Nike Air Force 1 '07 features the signature Nike Swoosh logo prominently displayed on the sides, symbolizing the brand's commitment to quality and performance. Additionally, the model typically includes perforations on the toe box for enhanced breathability, keeping your feet cool and comfortable.

name: Nike Air Force 1 '07 Next Nature
description: The Nike Air Force 1 '07 Next Nature sneakers are a modern iteration of the iconic Air Force 1 silhouette with a unique nature-inspired twist. These shoes seamlessly blend classic design elements with contemporary materials, resulting in a stylish and versatile footwear option.The upper of the Nike Air Force 1 '07 Next Nature features a combination of synthetic materials and textile overlays, providing durability and breathability. The nature-inspired theme is evident through the intricate patterns and textures found on the upper, resembling the organic patterns found in the natural world. These patterns add a visually striking element to the shoes, making them stand out from the crowd.Equipped with a low-top design, these sneakers offer a comfortable and snug fit. They feature a lace-up closure system that allows for a personalized fit, ensuring that the shoes stay securely in place during everyday activities. The padded collar and tongue enhance the overall comfort, providing cushioning and support around the ankle.Underneath, the Nike Air Force 1 '07 Next Nature boasts a durable rubber outsole, known for its excellent traction and grip. This outsole ensures reliable performance on various surfaces, making these sneakers suitable for both urban environments and outdoor adventures. Additionally, the Air-Sole unit in the heel provides responsive cushioning, minimizing the impact on the feet and offering enhanced comfort throughout the day.The Nike Air Force 1 '07 Next Nature sneakers not only offer exceptional functionality but also make a fashion statement. The nature-inspired design elements combined with the classic Air Force 1 silhouette create a unique aesthetic that appeals to sneaker enthusiasts and fashion-forward individuals alike. Whether you're looking for a reliable everyday shoe or a stylish addition to your sneaker collection, the Nike Air Force 1 '07 Next Nature delivers both in terms of style and performance.

name: Nike Court Vision Lo Nn
description: The Nike Court collection recreates the basketball style of the mid-1980s and is used as a casual street shoe. The Nike Court Vision Lo Nn combines a much-loved design with modern technology. The upper part of the sneakers is made of high-quality synthetic leather, which ensures durability and resistance to wear. Perforated inserts in the top of the shoe ensure air circulation inside the shoe. The model has soft edges around the ankle, which guarantees comfort during movement. A vulcanized construction connects the sole to the upper for a flexible feel, while the rubber outsole provides a firm grip. Nike cares about reducing the impact on the environment, so the upper material contains at least 20% recycled fibers.

name: Nike Air Huarache Black
description: The Nike Air Huarache sneakers are a stylish and iconic footwear model known for their distinctive design and exceptional comfort. These sneakers boast a blend of sporty and futuristic aesthetics, making them a popular choice among fashion enthusiasts and athletes alike.The upper of the Nike Air Huarache features a combination of synthetic materials and textile, providing a lightweight and breathable feel. The neoprene inner sleeve hugs the foot for a secure and snug fit, ensuring maximum comfort during extended wear. The shoe's iconic heel cage adds structural support and stability, while also contributing to its unique look.One of the standout features of the Nike Air Huarache is its signature cushioning system. The midsole incorporates Nike's Air technology, which consists of pressurized air units strategically placed to deliver responsive and impact-absorbing cushioning. This innovative design allows for a smooth and comfortable stride, whether you're running, walking, or engaging in various sports activities.The outsole of the Nike Air Huarache is made from durable rubber, providing excellent traction and grip on various surfaces. Its flex grooves enhance flexibility, allowing for natural foot movement and agility.

name: Nike Air Max Plus Black&Red
description: Nike Air Max Plus is a popular athletic footwear model that combines sleek design with exceptional performance. These sneakers are known for their distinctive aesthetic and advanced cushioning technology, making them a favorite among athletes and sneaker enthusiasts alike.The upper of the Nike Air Max Plus is crafted from a combination of durable synthetic materials and breathable mesh panels. This construction ensures a comfortable and supportive fit while allowing air to circulate, keeping your feet cool and dry during intense workouts or everyday wear.One of the standout features of the Air Max Plus is its unique gradient design. The upper features a gradient color scheme that transitions from vibrant hues at the bottom to more subdued tones at the top, creating a visually striking and eye-catching look. This design element adds a touch of modernity and style to the overall appearance of the shoe.The Air Max Plus also boasts the signature visible Air Max unit, which is located in the sole of the shoe. This innovative cushioning technology provides exceptional impact absorption and responsive support, allowing for a comfortable stride and reducing the risk of fatigue and injury. The Air Max unit is designed to deliver maximum cushioning and bounce-back, making these sneakers ideal for high-impact activities.

name: Nike Air Max 97 Black&White
description: Nike Air Max 97 is a classic sneaker model that has garnered immense popularity since its initial release in 1997. These iconic sneakers are known for their sleek and futuristic design, which continues to captivate sneaker enthusiasts to this day.The Nike Air Max 97 features a distinctive silhouette with a low-top profile and a streamlined appearance. The upper is constructed with a combination of materials such as mesh, leather, and synthetic overlays, providing a comfortable and durable fit. The shoe's most notable feature is the wavy, undulating lines that run along the entire length of the upper, creating a unique visual appeal.Equipped with Nike's groundbreaking Air Max technology, the Air Max 97 boasts exceptional cushioning and support. The full-length Air unit, visible through the translucent outsole, offers superior impact absorption and responsiveness, making these sneakers ideal for everyday wear or athletic activities.The Air Max 97 also includes several design elements that enhance both style and functionality. A lace-up closure system ensures a secure fit, while padded collar and tongue provide additional comfort. The tongue features Nike branding, and the iconic Swoosh logo adorns the sides of the shoe, adding a touch of brand recognition.Available in a wide range of colorways, the Nike Air Max 97 offers options to suit different preferences and styles. Whether you prefer bold and vibrant hues or a more understated and versatile color palette, there is a version of the Air Max 97 to match your taste.

name: Nike Waffle Debut Black
description: Inspired by Nike Daybreak, the elegant Nike Waffle Debut sneaker adds retro charm to your style. Suede and nylon in pastel colors, updated wedge midsole with lift - perfect for everyday wear. The midsole made of foam material creates a feeling of elasticity with each step. Style, comfort, iconic Waffle sole - all in one pair. The Swoosh logo is used as a loop, wrapping around the heel, which not only adds aesthetic appeal, but also provides convenience when putting on and taking off the shoe.
